Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka will face India in the third T20I match at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium.
India holds a 2-0 lead in the series, making their third consecutive win likely.
Suryakumar Yadav is expected to win the toss, given his better record compared to Charith Asalanka.
Key players for India include Yashasvi Jaiswal, Suryakumar Yadav, Rishabh Pant, and Hardik Pandya in batting, while Arshdeep Singh, Axar Patel, Ravi Bishnoi, and Riyan Parag are crucial in bowling.
Sri Lanka's opening pair of Pathum Nissanka and Kusal Mendis have provided strong starts, but the rest of the batting lineup has struggled.
Matheesha Pathirana and Wanindu Hasaranga have been prominent in Sri Lanka's bowling efforts.
The pitch is expected to favor batting, with scores likely around 175-185 in the first innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the third of a three-match series.
The venue is the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, with good batting conditions.
